===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=2|rs=彡04}}

# [[shape]], [[form]], [[style]]

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[ぎょう]] (gyō) < [[ぎやう]] (gyau)
|kanon=[[けい]] (kei)
|kun=[[がた]] (gata), [[かた]] (kata), [[かたち]] (katachi), [[かたぎ]] (katagi), [[なり]] (nari)
|nanori=[[ち]] (chi)
}}

====Compounds====
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-l|形声|けいせい|keisei}}: the [[phonosemantic]] formation of a [[kanji]] character from elements signifying meaning and elements signifying sound
* {{ja-l|形成|けいせい|keisei}}: [[formation]], [[shape]]
* {{ja-l|形而下|けいじか|keijika}}: [[physical]], [[material]]
* {{ja-l|形而上|けいじじょう|keijijō}}: [[metaphysical]]
* {{ja-l|形而上学|けいじじょうがく|keijijōgaku}}: [[metaphysics]]
* {{ja-l|形容詞|けいようし|keiyōshi}}: [[adjective]]
* {{ja-l|形容動詞|けいようどうし|keiyō dōshi}}: {{qualifier|Japanese grammar}} [[adjectival]] [[noun]], ''na-'' adjective
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-l|形態|けいたい|keitai}}: [[shape]], [[form]]
* {{ja-l|形態学|けいたいがく|keitaigaku}}: {{qualifier|biology}} [[morphology]]
* {{ja-l|形態論|けいたいろん|keitairon}}: {{qualifier|linguistics}} [[morphology]]
* {{ja-l|形体|けいたい|keitai}}: [[physical]] [[shape]]
* {{ja-l|形相|ぎょうそう|gyōsō}}: a [[facial expression]], a [[look]]
* {{ja-l|形相|けいそう|keisō}}: {{qualifier|philosophy}} the [[form]], the ''[[eidos]]''; the [[Platonic]] [[ideal]]
* {{ja-l|原形質|げんけいしつ|genkeishitsu}}: [[protoplasm]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 1===
Probably related to {{ja-l|堅い}} / {{ja-l|硬い}} / {{ja-l|固い||katai}}, {{m|en|hard}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ka.ta/|[ka̠ta̠]}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|型}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かた}}

# a [[shape]]
# a [[form]]
# a [[pattern]], [[die]], or [[model]] from which [[copies]] are made
# on a [[coin]], the side with writing on it: see antonym {{ja-l|縵面||name}}
# [[collateral]] for [[borrow]]ed [[money]]

===Etymology 2===
Derived from ''kata'' above. {{rendaku2|sort=かた'|kata|gata}} Only found in compounds.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ɡa.ta/|[ɡa̠ta̠]|[ŋa̠ta̠]}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|型}}

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|suffix|がた}}

# {{qualifier|affixed to nouns}}: the [[shape]] or [[form]] of the affixed noun
#: {{ja-usex|渦巻き'''形'''|うずまき'''がた'''|a [[whirlpool]] '''shape'''}}
#: {{ja-usex|卵'''形'''|たまご'''がた'''|an [[egg]] '''shape'''}}
# {{qualifier|affixed to [[on'yomi]] nouns}}: a [[typical]] example of the affixed noun; the [[type]] of the affixed noun
#: {{ja-usex|学者'''形'''|がくしゃ'''がた'''|a [[scholar]] '''type'''}}
#: {{ja-usex|英雄'''形'''|えいゆう'''がた'''|a [[hero]] '''type'''}}

=====Usage notes=====
For a [[shape]], the spelling {{l|ja|形}} is more commonly used. For a [[type]], the spelling {{l|ja|型}} is more commonly used.

===Etymology 3===
Derived from {{ja-l|形木||katagi}}, itself a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=かたぎ|形|tr1=kata|t1=shape|木|tr2=ki|t2=tree, wood}}, meaning {{m|en|stencil}}. {{rendaku2|sort=かたぎ|ki|gi}}

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ka.ta.ɡi/|[ka̠ta̠ɡi]}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|気質}}
* {{ja-l|容気}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かたぎ}}

# [[social]] [[customs]], [[mores]]
# one's [[appearance]]; one's [[stance]] or [[body language]]
# one's [[character]], [[disposition]], [[nature]]

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|かたぎ|suffix}}

# the [[character]], [[disposition]], or [[nature]] of the affixed noun

===Etymology 4===
{{unk.|lang=ja|sort=かたち}}. Appears to be {{IPAchar|/kata/}} + {{IPAchar|/chi/}}, but the derivation of the {{IPAchar|/chi/}} element is unclear.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ka.ta.t͡ɕi/|[ka̠ta̠t͡ɕi]}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|容}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かたち}}

# [[shape]] or [[form]]
# [[form]], as opposed to [[substance]]
# [[shapeliness]]: see {{ja-l|形有り||katachiari}}

===Etymology 5===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=けい}} {{m|ltc|形|tr=heng}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|形|tr=xíng}}. The {{m|ja|漢音|sc=Latn|''kan'on''}} reading, so likely a later borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}: {{m|ja|漢音|sc=Latn|Kan'on}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ke.e/|[ke̞ː]}}

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|suffix|けい}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=けい|linguistics}} [[grammatical]] [[tense]]
#: {{ja-usex|過去'''形'''|かこ'''けい'''|the [[past tense|past '''tense''']]}}
#: {{ja-usex|将来'''形'''|しょうらい'''けい'''|the [[future tense|future '''tense''']]}}
# {{qualifier|Japanese grammar}} a [[conjugation]] form of a [[verb]]
#: {{ja-usex|連用'''形'''|れんよう'''けい'''|the [[continuative]] '''form'''}}
#: {{ja-usex|命令'''形'''|めいれい'''けい'''|the [[imperative]] or [[command]] '''form'''}}

===Etymology 6===
From {{ja-l|成り||nari}}, the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||[[continuative]] form}} of the verb {{m|ja|成る|tr=naru||to become}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/na.ri/|[na̠ɽi]}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|態}}
* {{ja-l|なり}}

====Usage notes====
The most common spelling for this use is {{ja-l|なり}}, for all parts of speech.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|なり}}

# one's [[clothing]] and [[appearance]]
# one's body [[shape]] or [[form]]
# one's [[circumstances]] or [[situation]]
# one's [[reputation]]
# following the plain [[imperfective]] form ([[attributive]] form, {{ja-l|連対形||rentaikei}}) or plain [[perfective]] form of a verb, indicates the state of the affixed verb or phrase: compare English {{m|en|just}} {{m|en|as}}
#: {{ja-usex|人々の言う'''なり'''になった|ひとびと の いう '''なり''' に なった|things turned out '''just as''' people were saying}}
# following the plain [[imperfective]] form ([[attributive]] form, {{ja-l|連対形||rentaikei}}) of an adjective, indicates responding to the affixed adjective: compare English {{m|en|fitting}}
#: {{ja-usex|寒ければ寒い'''なり'''の厚着をする|さむければ さむい '''なり''' の あつぎ を する|if it's cold, '''then''' put on warm clothing / if it's cold, then put on warm clothes '''for''' cold weather}}
# following the plain [[imperfective]] form ([[attributive]] form, {{ja-l|連対形||rentaikei}}) of a verb, indicates the moment of the action occurring: compare English {{m|en|as soon as}}
#: {{ja-usex|断りを聞く'''なり'''泣き出した|ことわり を きく '''なり''' なきだした|she burst into tears '''as soon as''' she heard the rejection}}
# following a noun, indicates a state [[fitting]] or [[becoming]] to the affixed noun
#: {{ja-usex|子供'''なり'''に想像する|こども '''なり''' に そうぞう する|imagine '''in a way fitting for''' a child / imagine '''like''' a child (implies that the subject is a child)}}
#: {{ja-usex|自分'''なり'''の判断|じぶん '''なり''' の はんだん|my own '''kind of''' decision / deciding '''in''' my own '''way'''}}
# following a noun, indicates that [[shape]] or [[form]]: compare English {{m|en|like}}
#: {{ja-usex|弓'''なり'''になる|ゆみ '''なり''' に なる|to become bow-'''shaped''' / to become '''like''' a bow}}

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|なり|suffix}}

# following the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||[[continuative]] form}} of a verb, indicates the state of the affixed verb or phrase: compare English {{m|en|just}} {{m|en|as}}
#: {{ja-usex|人々が言い'''なり'''になった|ひとびと が いい'''なり''' に なった|things turned out '''just as''' people say}}

[[Category:ja:Grammar|けい]]
